subtasks: WriteTestLineItemsTypeDropdown: Write test for LineItemsTable Type dropdown has Credit and Debit options
WriteTestLineItemsTypeDefault: Write test for LineItemsTable Type dropdown defaults to Debit for new rows
WriteTestLineItemsAmountInput: Write test for LineItemsTable Amount input accepts numeric values
WriteTestLineItemsDeleteRow: Write test for LineItemsTable delete row button removes line item
WriteTestLineItemsAddBtn: Write test for LineItemsTable Add Line Item button adds new row
WriteTestLineItemsMultiple: Write test for LineItemsTable supports multiple line items for multi-account transactions
WriteTestLineItemsInitial: Write test for LineItemsTable initial state for new transaction has two empty rows
WriteTestBalanceDebits: Write test for BalanceIndicator displays Total Debits sum
WriteTestBalanceCredits: Write test for BalanceIndicator displays Total Credits sum
WriteTestBalanceBalanced: Write test for BalanceIndicator shows balanced state when debits equal credits
WriteTestBalanceUnbalanced: Write test for BalanceIndicator shows unbalanced state when debits do not equal credits
WriteTestBalanceDynamic: Write test for BalanceIndicator updates dynamically when line items change
WriteTestBalanceValidation: Write test for BalanceIndicator validation prevents saving unbalanced transaction
WriteTestBalanceZero: Write test for BalanceIndicator shows zero totals for empty line items
WriteTestBalanceDelete: Write test for BalanceIndicator updates when a line item row is deleted
WriteTestTagsLabel: Write test for TagsInput displays label with optional indicator
WriteTestTagsChips: Write test for TagsInput displays existing tags as removable chips
WriteTestTagsAdd: Write test for TagsInput add a new tag by typing
WriteTestTagsRemove: Write test for TagsInput remove a tag by clicking X
WriteTestTagsMultiple: Write test for TagsInput allows adding multiple tags
WriteTestTagsOptional: Write test for TagsInput field is optional and transaction saves without tags
WriteTestTagsPersisted: Write test for TagsInput tags are persisted with saved transaction
WriteComponentDateRangeFilter: Write the DateRangeFilter component for TransactionsPage
WriteComponentAccountFilter: Write the AccountFilter component for TransactionsPage
WriteComponentMaterialFilter: Write the MaterialFilter component for TransactionsPage
WriteComponentTransactionTypeFilter: Write the TransactionTypeFilter component for TransactionsPage
WriteComponentSearchBar: Write the SearchBar component for TransactionsPage
WriteComponentTransactionsTable: Write the TransactionsTable component for TransactionsPage
WritePageTransactionsPage: Write the full TransactionsPage with all components
WriteTestTransactionsPageFilters: Write Playwright tests for TransactionsPage filter components (DateRangeFilter, AccountFilter, MaterialFilter, TransactionTypeFilter, SearchBar)
WriteTestTransactionsPageTable: Write Playwright tests for TransactionsPage table and sorting (TransactionsTable)
WriteTestTransactionsPagePagination: Write Playwright tests for TransactionsPage pagination (Pagination)
FixViolationMissingEditActionTestEntry: Add test entry for Edit action in actions menu specifying navigation to /clients/:clientId
FixViolationAttachmentTimelineAndNotifications: Add missing timeline entry and follower notification test entries for AddAttachmentModal and attachment deletion in ClientDetailPage tests.md
FixViolationNativeSelectClientHeader: Replace native <select> elements in ClientHeader edit modal (Type and Status) with FilterSelect components

FixViolationTimelineUserLinks: Fix timeline user links to navigate to /users/:userId instead of '#' - requires adding createdByUserId to timeline data model and updating TimelineSectionClient component

FixViolationTasksListImportExportTestEntries: Add missing test entries in docs/tests.md for Import button, Export button, and ImportDialog format specification in TasksListHeader. The Import/Export buttons exist in code but have no test entries. The ImportDialog defines columns (Title, Description, Due Date, Priority, Client Name, Assignee) but no test entry verifies format docs are visible.
RunTests: Verify tests pass after fix

FixViolationTasksListMarkCompleteTimeline: Add missing test entry in docs/tests.md for the Mark Complete action's timeline side effect. The backend (netlify/functions/tasks.ts:287-293) creates a 'Task Completed' timeline event on the associated client when Mark Complete is used, but the test entry only mentions removal from the list. The testSpec directive requires side effects to be tested.
RunTests: Verify tests pass after fix

FixViolationTasksListAssigneeRole: Fix missing assignee role display in TaskCardList. Test entry says 'name with role (e.g., Sarah J. (PM))' but component only shows assigneeName. Need to: (1) add role column to users table in schema.ts, (2) update backend tasks.ts query to JOIN and return assignee role, (3) add assigneeRole to Task interface in tasksSlice.ts, (4) update TaskCardList.tsx to display role in parentheses. Also update docs/tests.md if needed.
RunTests: Verify tests pass after fix

FixViolationTasksListFollowerNotifications: Fix missing follower notifications on task creation. Test entry says 'Task creation triggers follower notifications on the client' but backend tasks.ts POST handler only creates a timeline event - no follower notification is sent. Other functions (writeups.ts, deals.ts, task-notes.ts) implement the pattern: query client_followers JOIN notification_preferences, check task_created preference, create notification records. Add the same pattern to tasks.ts POST handler after the timeline event creation.
RunTests: Verify tests pass after fix

FixViolationNavDuplicateLinks: Fix TopNavBar.tsx where all 4 nav link onClick handlers call navigate('/'), making them duplicate links to the same URL. The directive says 'Navigation sidebars and menus must not contain duplicate links pointing to the same URL.' The nav items have different href paths (/, /#suppliers, /#orders, /#inventory) but the onClick ignores these. Fix the onClick handlers to use hash-based scrolling so Suppliers scrolls to the suppliers section, Orders scrolls to orders section, etc. on the dashboard page.
RunTests: Verify tests pass after fix

FixViolationSupplierDetailsTabLinks: Add missing test entries for the three SupplierDetailsPage section-level tab links (Documents, Comments, Orders) that scroll to sections when clicked - these interactive elements lack dedicated test entries per testSpec.md directive to inventory every visible element
RunTests: Verify tests pass after fix

FixViolationSupplierDetailsModalTests: Add missing test entries for Edit Supplier modal Cancel and Validation, and Upload Document dialog Cancel - per testSpec.md directive to completely test modal dialogs. Other modals in the app (Add New Supplier, Create Purchase Order) have these entries but the SupplierDetailsPage modals do not
RunTests: Verify tests pass after fix
